scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.handler.yml down --remove-orphans; docker compose -f docker-compose.youth.yml down --remove-orphans; docker compose -f docker-compose.employer.yml down --remove-orphans; docker compose -f docker-compose.benefit.yml down --remove-orphans; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q);
scripts.benefit:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/benefit/applicant/.next; yarn benefit build --no-cache; yarn benefit:up
scripts.employer:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/employer/.next;yarn employer build --no-cache; yarn employer:up
scripts.handler:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/*/.next; yarn handler build --no-cache; yarn handler:up
scripts.youth:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/kesaseteli/youth/.next; yarn youth build --no-cache; yarn youth:up
scripts.tet-admin:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/tet/admin/.next; yarn tet-admin build --no-cache; yarn tet-admin:up
scripts.tet-youth:rebuild: yarn clean; rm -rf frontend/tet/youth/.next; yarn tet-youth build --no-cache; yarn tet-youth:up
